    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    RetryConfig.Builder
    RetryConfig.Builder.backoffMultiplier(double backoffMultiplier)
    Sets the multiplier used for exponential backoff between retry attempts.
    RetryConfig.Builder
    RetryConfig.Builder.connectionTimeoutMillis(int connectionTimeoutMillis)
    Sets the connection timeout in milliseconds.
    RetryConfig.Builder
    RetryConfig.Builder.initialBackoffMillis(long initialBackoffMillis)
    Sets the initial backoff time in milliseconds before the first retry attempt.
    RetryConfig.Builder
    RetryConfig.Builder.jitterFactor(double jitterFactor)
    Sets the jitter factor to apply to backoff times.
    RetryConfig.Builder
    RetryConfig.Builder.maxRetries(int maxRetries)
    Sets the maximum number of retry attempts.
    RetryConfig.Builder
    RetryConfig.Builder.socketTimeoutMillis(int socketTimeoutMillis)
    Sets the socket timeout in milliseconds.
    RetryConfig.Builder
    RetryConfig.Builder.useJitter(boolean useJitter)
    Sets whether to apply jitter to backoff times.
